WorkItem.Description:
Good Day:
 
If it use the TaskEditDialog, and edit a task it works fine the first time.  However, If I decide to edit the same task a second time I get the following error:
 
Value of '12/31/9999 12:00:00 AM' is not valid for 'Value'. 'Value' should be between 'MinDate' and 'MaxDate'.
Parameter name: Value
 
All I'm doing is changing the time on a trigger.   The first time it works fine.  But trying to do anything with it after that it gives an error.  To get the error I have to edit a task.  then bring the task back up in the editor and then I get this error.
 
Anyone have any ideas?
 
Mary.
WorkItem.Summary: TaskEditDialog Getting error if I try and edit a second time

Comments.Message: Fixed in build 54519. Problem with losing just enough accuracy in the DateTime string representation to make it not equal to MaxTime.
